chargeHist.descr: Take and Drive Vehicle w/o Consent
Take and Drive Vehicle w/o Consent

result.execSummary:
The defendant Ashlyn E Hauser was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Take/Drive Veh. w/o Consent-Abandon Veh., a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.23(3m).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Waukesha County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
Straight time if imposed.
Consecutive to: Any other sentence.
4/19/2017 - PER DOC REQUEST, COURT REDUCES PROBATION FROM 3 YEARS TO 2 YEARS.

miscConds.notes: Costs to be paid as a condition of probation.

No contact with: GlennC., Bethany H. (unless they consent and the agent approves). No contact with Steven B. and Alyssa B.  Maintain full time employment and/or school combination.  Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent.  Provide DNA Sample if not yet already previously obtained. 
Comply with random urine screens.  Maintain absolute sobriety. 
  If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.

timeConds.notes: Non-working hours with standard release conditions including release for work, school, and counseling.  Sentence credit of 58 days were granted.  Sentence commencing forthwith.
To be performed as a condition of probation.  Court authorizes credit towards costs/fine to be at the rate of $10.00/hour.  Agent to make any financial adjustments.
